verses.verse: A Psalm of Solomon. Give<WH5414> the king<WH4428> thy judgments<WH4941>, O God<WH430>, And thy righteousness<WH6666> unto the king<WH4428>'s son<WH1121>.
He will judge<WH1777> thy people<WH5971> with righteousness<WH6664>, And thy poor<WH6041> with justice<WH4941>.
The mountains<WH2022> shall bring<WH5375> peace<WH7965> to the people<WH5971>, And the hills<WH1389>, in righteousness<WH6666>.
He will judge<WH8199> the poor<WH6041> of the people<WH5971>, He will save<WH3467> the children<WH1121> of the needy<WH34>, And will break in pieces<WH1792> the oppressor<WH6231>.
They shall fear<WH3372> thee while<WH5973> the sun<WH8121> endureth<WH6440>, And so long as the moon<WH3394>, throughout all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.
He will come down<WH3381> like rain<WH4306> upon the mown<WH1488> grass<WH7241>, As showers that water<WH2222> the earth<WH776>.
In his days<WH3117> shall the righteous<WH6662> flourish<WH6524>, And abundance<WH7230> of peace<WH7965>, till the moon be no more<WH3394>.
He shall have dominion<WH7287> also from sea<WH3220> to sea<WH3220>, And from the River<WH5104> unto the ends<WH657> of the earth<WH776>.
They that dwell in the wilderness<WH6728> shall bow<WH3766> before<WH6440> him<WH341>; And his enemies shall lick<WH3897> the dust<WH6083>.
The kings<WH4428> of Tarshish<WH8659> and of the isles<WH339> shall render<WH7725> tribute<WH4503>: The kings<WH4428> of Sheba<WH7614> and Seba<WH5434> shall offer<WH7126> gifts<WH814>.
Yea <WH4428>, all kings shall fall down<WH7812> before him<WH1471>; All nations shall serve him<WH5647>.
For he will deliver<WH5337> the needy<WH34> when he crieth<WH7768>, And the poor<WH6041>, that hath no helper<WH5826>.
He will have pity<WH2347> on the poor<WH1800> and needy<WH1800>, And the souls<WH5315> of the needy<WH34> he will save<WH3467>.
He will redeem<WH1350> their soul<WH5315> from oppression<WH8496> and violence<WH2555>; And precious<WH3365> will their blood<WH1818> be in his sight<WH5869>:

And they shall live<WH2421>; and to him shall be given<WH5414> of the gold<WH2091> of Sheba<WH7614>: And men shall pray<WH6419> for him continually<WH8548>; They shall bless<WH1288> him all the day long<WH3117>.

There shall be abundance<WH6451> of grain<WH1250> in the earth<WH776> upon the top<WH7218> of the mountains<WH2022>; The fruit<WH6529> thereof shall shake<WH7493> like Lebanon<WH3844>: And they of the city<WH5892> shall flourish<WH6692> like grass<WH6212> of the earth<WH776>.

His name<WH8034> shall endure for ever<WH5769>; His name<WH8034> shall be continued<WH5125> as long as<WH6440> the sun<WH8121>: And men shall be blessed<WH1288> in him<WH1471>; All nations shall call him happy<WH833>.
Blessed <WH1288> be Jehovah<WH3068> God<WH430>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, Who only doeth<WH6213> wondrous things<WH6381>:
And blessed<WH1288> be his glorious<WH3519> name<WH8034> for ever<WH5769>; And let the whole earth<WH776> be filled<WH4390> with his glory<WH3519>. Amen<WH543>, and Amen<WH543>.
The prayers<WH8605> of David<WH1732> the son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448> are ended<WH3615>.
